about_the_game:
Mushroom Kid's Big Grass Sword is a narrative, physics-based, precision platformer that follows Mica, a little mushroom, on a journey to rescue their village after the residents are captured by a gigantic bird. Meet Grandmashroom as she leads Mica to a mysterious temple to claim the Blade of Grass: a powerful weapon with the ability to pull Mica up ledges and over dangerous obstacles.



The Blade of Grass is a unique weapon that can be rotated at any angle the player desires, allowing Mica to be pulled over obstacles. Combining this with Mica's jumping and gliding abilities creates a platforming experience like no other. Mica must time his jumps and angle the blade to overcome challenges and traverse a mystical world, meeting several wacky mushrooms and growing the sword to comical lengths along the way.

Key Features

  • Wield the Blade of Grass!
  • Master a unique move-set!
  • Meet funny characters throughout your journey!
  • Mushrooms... lots of mushrooms...🍄🍄🍄🍄🍄🍄🍄🍄🍄🍄

Meet wacky characters and wield the Blade of Grass: a magical sword you can use to scale walls and swing around danger.
